4539380.headline: Devon Energy Announces First-Quarter Dividend, Increases Share-Repurchase Authorization To $2.0 Billion
4539380.description: May 2 (Reuters) - Devon Energy Corp <DVN.N>::DEVON ENERGY ANNOUNCES FIRST-QUARTER DIVIDEND, INCREASES SHARE-REPURCHASE AUTHORIZATION TO $2.0 BILLION.

4556729.headline: Devon Energy Announces Bolt-On Acquisition In The Williston Basin
4556729.description: Devon Energy Corp <DVN.N>::DEVON ENERGY ANNOUNCES BOLT-ON ACQUISITION IN THE WILLISTON BASIN.DEVON ENERGY CORP - DEAL FOR CONSIDERATION OF $865 MILLION.DEVON ENERGY CORP - TRANSACTION IMMEDIATELY ACCRETIVE TO FINANCIAL METRICS.DEVON ENERGY CORP - BOARD INTENDS TO APPROVE A 13 PERCENT INCREASE TO FIXED QUARTERLY DIVIDEND DUE TO ACCRETIVE NATURE OF TRANSACTION.DEVON ENERGY CORP - ALSO EXPECTS TRANSACTION TO BE ACCRETIVE TO VARIABLE DIVIDEND PAYOUT IN 2022 AND BEYOND.DEVON ENERGY CORP - ESTIMATES APPROXIMATELY $100 MILLION OF CAPITAL EXPENDITURES TO BE INCURRED POST-CLOSING IN 2022 IN WILLISTON BASIN.

4580327.headline: Devon Energy Announces Bolt-On Acquisition In The Eagle Ford
4580327.description: Aug 9 (Reuters) - Devon Energy Corp <DVN.N>::DEVON ENERGY ANNOUNCES BOLT-ON ACQUISITION IN THE EAGLE FORD.DEVON ENERGY CORP - TO ACQUIRE VALIDUS ENERGY, AN EAGLE FORD OPERATOR, FOR TOTAL CASH CONSIDERATION OF $1.8 BILLION.DEVON ENERGY CORP - DEAL IMMEDIATELY ACCRETIVE TO FINANCIAL METRICS.DEVON ENERGY CORP - ACQUISITION IS EXPECTED TO BE IMMEDIATELY ACCRETIVE TO ALL RELEVANT PER-SHARE METRICS IN FIRST YEAR.DEVON - DUE TO ACCRETIVE NATURE OF DEAL TO FREE CASH FLOW, OUTLOOK FOR CO'S VARIABLE DIVIDEND INCREASES BY UP TO 10% ON PER-SHARE BASIS AT STRIP PRICING.DEVON ENERGY  - EXPECTS TO REALIZE $50 MILLION IN AVERAGE ANNUAL CASH FLOW SAVINGS FROM CAPITAL EFFICIENCIES, OPERATING IMPROVEMENTS, MARKETING SYNERGIES.

4660310.headline: Devon Energy Reports Fourth-Quarter Results
4660310.description: Feb 14 (Reuters) - Devon Energy Corp <DVN.N>::DEVON ENERGY REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2022 RESULTS; DECLARES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND AND RAISES FIXED DIVIDEND BY 11 PERCENT IN 2023.FOR THE FULL-YEAR 2023, DEVON EXPECTS TO SUSTAIN PRODUCTION IN THE RANGE OF 643,000 TO 663,000 BOE PER DAY.TOTAL CAPITAL  INVESTMENT FOR THE YEAR IS EXPECTED TO RANGE FROM $3.6 BILLION TO $3.8 BILLION.CAPITAL REQUIREMENTS IN 2023 ARE ESTIMATED TO BE SELF-FUNDED AT PRICING LEVELS AS LOW AS A $40 WTI OIL PRICE.FIRST-QUARTER PRODUCTION IS EXPECTED TO APPROXIMATE 635,000 BOE PER DAY.QTRLY TOTAL PRODUCTION AVERAGED 636,000 OIL-EQUIVALENT BARRELS (BOE)\/DAY VERSUS 611,000 BOE\/D IN Q4 2021.QTRLY CORE EARNINGS WERE $1.1 BILLION, OR $1.66 PER DILUTED SHARE.DEVON REPORTED NET EARNINGS OF $1.2 BILLION, OR $1.83 PER DILUTED SHARE, IN THE FOURTH QUARTER OF 2022.QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $4,299 MILLION VERSUS$4,273 MILLION AS REPORTED LAST YEAR.PROVED RESERVES INCREASED 12 PERCENT TO 1.8 BILLION BOE AT YEAR-END 2022.BOARD APPROVED AN 11 PERCENT INCREASE TO THE FIXED QUARTERLY DIVIDEND IN 2023.Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.75, REVENUE VIEW $4.39 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.QTRLY DILUTED NET EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.83.

4705230.headline: Devon Energy Q1 Adj. EPS Beats Expectations
4705230.description: May 8 (Reuters) - Devon Energy Q1 dividend USD 0.72.:.

4742735.headline: Devon Energy Q2 Adjusted EPS USD 1.18 Vs. IBES Estimate USD 1.18
4742735.description: Aug 01 (Reuters) - Devon Energy Q2 adjusted free cash flow USD 1,400 million.:.

4785863.headline: Devon Energy Q3 Adjusted EPS USD 1.65 Vs. IBES Estimate USD 1.57
4785863.description: Nov 07 (Reuters) - Devon Energy Q3 EPS USD 1.42.:.
